entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: High Level Airport 6:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -28.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
